description: Arcadia School, managed by Sunflowers Academy, is a program that provides quality after school care for children in K-2nd grade. We offer a variety of extracurricular activities, homework assistance, literacy classes, fitness and social skills building. Our goal is to provide children with a safe, caring environment that is influential to both learning and developing as well as provide recreational activities that are fun, stimulating and challenging.
name: ARCADIA ACADEMY, INC.
